S0421: Because they already know he's getting weak.
因为他们已经知道他变弱了。
S0423: Do they need to ask such an obvious question?
他们需要问这么明显的问题吗？
S0424: 不，他们在浪费大家的时间。
S0425: Yes they need to make sure they understand.
是的，他们需要确保他们理解。
S0426: They would like to love each other but they're unhappy.
他们想要彼此相爱，但他们不开心。
S0427: They wouldn't like you to think that they're bored.
他们不想让你觉得他们无聊。
S0428: Would they like to visit us on Tuesday?
他们想在星期二来看我们吗？
S0429: Yes that would be perfect for them.
是的，那对他们来说是完美的。
S0431: They're not ready yet but they'll be ready soon.
他们还没有准备好，但他们很快就准备好。
S0432: They could mean that they want you to ask.
他们可能是说他们想让你问。
S0433: They couldn't find out when the film started.
他们找不到电影什么时候开始。
S0434: Could they cut the number of students they take?
他们能减少他们招的学生数量吗？
S0435: Yes they could if they wanted to.
是的，如果他们想的话，他们能。
S0436: No there's a minimum number they need.
不，有一个他们需要的最少数量。
S0437: They wanted to raise as much as possible for charity.
他们想为慈善筹集尽可能多的钱。
S0438: They didn't want to decide what he should do.
他们不想决定他应该做什么。
S0440: They want to travel while they're still young.
他们想在他们还年轻的时候旅行。
S0442: Did they want to develop a new approach?
他们想开发一个新方法吗？
S0443: No they wanted to keep doing it the same way.
不，他们想继续用同样的方法做。
S0444: Yes they thought it could be done more efficiently.
是的，他们觉得可以更有效地做。
S0445: They will be able to carry that suitcase.
他们会能够拿那个行李箱。
S0446: They won't be able to break that window.
他们不会能够打破那个窗户。
S0447: Will they be able to drive us home after the meal?
他们能在饭后开车送我们回家吗？
S0448: Yes they'll be happy to help.
是的，他们会很高兴帮忙。
S0449: They said that they were almost ready.
他们说他们差不多准备好了。
S0450: No they have to catch the train themselves.
不，他们必须自己赶火车。
S0451: They said what they wanted to do.
他们说了他们想做什么。
S0452: They didn't say what they wanted to do.
他们没有说他们想做什么。
S0453: Did they say who they saw last night?
他们说了他们昨晚看到谁了吗？
S0454: Our friends came round at about six o'clock.
我们的朋友大约六点钟来了。
S0455: We had to leave because the children were tired.
我们不得不离开，因为孩子们累了。
S0456: He might be there but it's not very likely.
他可能在那里，但不太可能。
S0457: Part of the problem is the number of different areas.
问题的一部分是不同地区的数量。
S0458: It was all much easier in the past.
在过去一切都容易得多。
S0459: It wasn't in front of the blue sign.
它不在蓝色标志的前面。
S0460: I want to find a shop near the hotel.
我想找酒店附近的一家商店。
S0461: A shop where I can buy some postcards.
一家我可以买一些明信片的商店。
S0462: My grandfather fought in Italy during the war.
我的祖父在战争期间在意大利战斗。
S0464: I told her my room number once but she forgot it.
我告诉过她一次我的房间号，但她忘了。
S0465: Next time I will ask her what her name is.
下次我会问她叫什么名字。
S0466: Let me throw it over the wall.
S0467: It's next to the car park.
S0469: But that doesn't mean we can't change it.
但那不意味着我们不能改变它。
S0470: How high do you want to climb before we stop?
你想在我们停下来之前爬多高？
S0471: Do you want to stop for a rest?
S0472: Part of the problem is that we don't know the facts.
问题的一部分是我们不知道事实。
S0474: I don't even want it as a free offer.
我甚至不想要它作为免费提供。
S0475: There are many reasons to consider waiting.
S0476: I'm waiting for the end of the second half.
我在等待下半场的结束。
S0477: He's been sick since the second day of the holidays.
他从假期的第二天起就一直生病。
S0478: She has such a kind heart.
S0479: It's the least I could do.
这是我能做的最少的事。
S0480: Whatever he says it's not far ahead now.
无论他说什么，它现在不远了。
S0481: It's the only real hope we have left.
这是我们剩下的唯一真正的希望。
S0482: The only real hope is that they're not serious.
唯一真正的希望是他们不是认真的。
S0483: Life isn't easy but it's not meant to be easy.
生活不容易，但它本来就不应该容易。
S0484: It's meant to be a challenge.
S0485: Nothing would make me happier than to get away.
没有什么比逃离更让我开心的了。
S0486: I think your eyes are beautiful.
S0488: It's on the other side of that yellow line.
它在那条黄线的另一边。
S0489: If you don't make me a strong cup of coffee right now.
如果你现在不给我泡一杯浓咖啡。
S0490: Then I will never trust anyone ever again.
那么我再也不会相信任何人了。
